categories: Genuine Innovations Tubeless Tire Plug Repair
description: When that hissing sound doesn't stop and is accompanied by a sealant-bleeding tire, you know you're in trouble. Whip out this tubeless repair kit and avoid having to walk to the car. In just a few seconds, you can put a plug in that hole with the included tool, and ride on.Includes 5 vulcanized butyl rubber rope plugs and a strong insertion tool.Repair is done with the tire mounted on the rim.
name: Genuine Innovations Genuine Innovations Tubeless Tire Plug Repair
